greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Number of twice-partitions whose domain is the integer partition with Heinz number n.
comment: The Heinz number of an integer partition (y_1,...,y_k) is prime(y_1)*...*prime(y_k).
link: Alois P. Heinz, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
program: (PARI) a(n) = {my(f = factor(n)); for (k=1, #f~, f[k, 1] = numbpart(primepi(f[k, 1]));); factorback(f);} \\ _Michel Marcus_, Feb 26 2018
results.author: _Gus Wiseman_, Feb 05 2018
